<script>
import Home from './views/Home.vue';
import List from './views/List.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Home,
    List,
  },

}
</script>
<template>
  <router-view />
</template>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: baseline;
  color: #2c3e50;

}
body {
  margin:0;

}
nav {
  position: absolute;
  padding: 30px;
  z-index:3;
  width:100%;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
  text-decoration: none;
  margin-right:20px;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #42b983;
  border-right:none;
}
</style>
